entry.title: [META] Organization of 1.1 Spec Effort
entry.summary: Matt Corallo is inquiring about updates on a conference call, which appeared to have only sparsely attended and was not favored by those who did attend. Rusty Russell responds that there is always a representative from Eclair, lnd and c-lightning at the calls, with several others usually present. Rusty also mentions that there was a consensus at the Hangouts meeting to try an IRC format for the next meeting, and he will send out a proper announcement message.
